scene.title: Ambush

mono.p: At this moment, hundreds of miles away…
A man laid on the golden sand, unable to move.
Beads of sweat emerged all over his body, making him itchy.
But he was motionless.
Even through clothes, the sand was so hot to the touch, it was burning his skin.
The man tried his best to focus, so he wouldn’t faint from all the heat and pain.
At times like this, he always remembered what the「Eagle」 once said:
If people like them were caught by imperial officers and soldiers, their chests would be branded with a red branding iron.
A branding iron was harder than sand and hotter than the sun. Once it touched the skin, it would melt a layer of skin and leave a brand.
That feeling,「Eagle」said: 「It's like going to hell」.
Golden Sand gang members often spoke of hell, after all they were destined to meet there again.
Hell was a scary place, and boring; there was no gold or silver, no good wine, no beautiful women.
You couldn’t name a single good thing there
But here, as long as they succeed in today's raid, they would have whatever they want.
This caravan was said to be larger than ones before, and the「Eagle」had received absolutely reliable information.
The caravan from far away brought the families of the rich and nobles, and the car was full of gold and silver treasures.
If the information was correct, in 30 minutes, all of these would belong to them.

scene.text: Thinking of it, he couldn't help but lift his head slightly, looking out of the corner of his eyes to the only man standing.

motion.img: 老鹰-普通-普通有刀-远景

scene.text: The man looked to be in his 40s, with white streaks of hair, wrinkles, and scars on his face written with hatred.

text.p: He was actually younger, but not too young. Looking at the whole face at a glance, only the eyes stood out: those were the eyes of an eagle.
He looked into the distance, as if hunting for his prey.

scene.text: He was just waiting for the upcoming prey, and the ambushing Golden Sand Gang were his minions.
「Eagle」—— that was his nickname, an honorific of respect and fear.
As long as it was an order from「Eagle」, even if the Golden Sand Gang had to lie on scorching sand for an hour, they would follow it.

text.p: There was no need to question, no promises,
As long as you followed the instructions of「Eagle」, the exchange would be——

motion.img: 老鹰-微笑-抱胸有刀-远景

text.p: Suddenly, a smile appeared on Eagle’s face,

scene.text: That pair of eyes stopped watching, and slowly turned around—— this was a signal to hunt.
「Eagle」raised his hand, took a step back, and then took another step back.
He was withdrawing from the sight of the caravan's guards, and his hand gesture was the signal to attack.

mono.p: The man on the sand looked forward again and gave a sigh of relief. Though the heated air was roasting his lungs, he didn’t mind.
Far away, dust was rising.
「It’s coming.」
Someone whispered.
The men who had been in ambush for a long time were relieved, the most difficult stage had passed.
From here on, there was only victory. And this victory……
Was something they’d been waiting for a long time.

scene.text: In one of the caravan carriages not far away, a coffin stood quietly.
It was about the height of an average person, the wood brightly painted with white lacquer and carved with ornate decorations.

text.p: From the outside, the coffin was completely sealed with no gaps present.
Several black leather straps were wrapped around the body of the coffin and bound it firmly.

scene.text: It seemed that the owner of this coffin had spent a lot of effort to completely isolate the contents from the outside world……
That owner was in front of it at the moment.

text.p: A man with blond hair and green eyes knelt next to the coffin on one knee, sliding his slender fingers across the coffin's surface.
His movements were as soft as if caressing, as if he had exhausted all his strength.
This person made the coffin with his own hands, so that the contents of the coffin would be isolated from the world.
It was this person who fought against the laws of the world, just to bring his beloved back to the present world.
Before his wish was fulfilled, he couldn't throw himself away from the world.
So, among the roars, shouts, and crying from afar;
among the wailing of camels, the overturning of carriages, the slashing of swords——
It seemed that everything except this coffin had nothing to do with him.

scene.text: It had nothing to do with him……
